# Sample dataset with mixed IPv4 and IPv6 prefixes for aggregation testing

# IPv4 prefixes - some adjacent and overlapping for aggregation
192.168.0.0/24
192.168.1.0/24
192.168.2.0/24
192.168.3.0/24
10.0.0.0/24
10.0.1.0/24
10.0.2.0/24
10.0.3.0/24
172.16.0.0/24
172.16.1.0/24
172.16.2.0/24
172.16.3.0/24

# More specific prefixes that can be aggregated
192.168.4.0/25
192.168.4.128/25
192.168.5.0/25
192.168.5.128/25
10.1.0.0/25
10.1.0.128/25
10.1.1.0/25
10.1.1.128/25

# Various prefix lengths
172.20.0.0/16
172.21.0.0/16
172.22.0.0/16
172.23.0.0/16
10.10.0.0/20
10.10.16.0/20
10.10.32.0/20
10.10.48.0/20

# Single addresses that might aggregate
192.168.100.0/32
192.168.100.1/32
192.168.100.2/32
192.168.100.3/32

# IPv6 prefixes - adjacent blocks
2001:db8::/48
2001:db8:1::/48
2001:db8:2::/48
2001:db8:3::/48
2001:db8:1000::/48
2001:db8:1001::/48
2001:db8:1002::/48
2001:db8:1003::/48

# More specific IPv6 prefixes
2001:db8:2000::/64
2001:db8:2000:1::/64
2001:db8:2000:2::/64
2001:db8:2000:3::/64
2001:db8:3000::/64
2001:db8:3000:1::/64
2001:db8:3000:2::/64
2001:db8:3000:3::/64

# Mixed real-world-like prefixes from different ranges
1.52.240.0/24
1.52.241.0/24
1.52.242.0/24
1.52.243.0/24
1.52.244.0/22
1.52.248.0/21
8.8.8.0/24
8.8.4.0/24
23.192.0.0/16
23.193.0.0/16
23.194.0.0/16
23.195.0.0/16

# More IPv6 from different ranges
2001:200::/40
2001:200:100::/43
2001:200:120::/44
2001:200:130::/46
2001:200:134::/48
2001:200:135::/48
2001:200:136::/47
2001:200:138::/45
2400:cb00::/32
2400:cb00:1::/48
2400:cb00:2::/48
2400:cb00:3::/48
2606:4700::/32
2606:4700:10::/48
2606:4700:20::/48
2606:4700:30::/48

# Some overlapping prefixes
10.50.0.0/16
10.50.0.0/24
10.50.1.0/24
10.50.128.0/17
172.30.0.0/16
172.30.0.0/20
172.30.16.0/20
172.30.128.0/17

# Edge cases
0.0.0.0/32
255.255.255.255/32
::1/128
ffff:ffff:ffff:ffff:ffff:ffff:ffff:ffff/128

# Various prefix lengths for testing
15.0.0.0/8
15.1.0.0/16
15.1.1.0/24
15.1.1.128/25
31.0.0.0/8
31.1.0.0/16
31.1.1.0/24
31.1.1.128/25

# More IPv6 variations
2a00:1450::/32
2a00:1450:4000::/48
2a00:1450:4001::/48
2a00:1450:4002::/48
2a00:1450:8000::/33
2a00:1450:c000::/34
